comments.body: To echo what @synapticarbors said, the `LICENSE.txt` file that is included in this PR should be removed.  This line is referring to the `LICENSE.txt` that is included in the root of the pypi tarball.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +36,40 @@  home: http://github.com/markovmodel/msmtools
  license: LGPL-3 
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'Tools for estimating and analyzing Markov state models'
  description: |
